abstract.para: Anyone interested in the development or future of mod-xslt can join the mailing lists.

article.para: Any question about mod-xslt? Problems using mod-xslt? Would you like to know more about the future of mod-xslt? Or you have any feature you would like in mod-xslt?
You can join or just post questions on the mod-xslt mailing list.

The mailing list is currently hosted on google groups:
if you have a gmail or other google account, you can subscribe from:
.
if you don't have a google account, you can create one for you by visiting:
Note that you can create an account and subscribe with your own email address, you don't need gmail. The account is used so you have a username and password to access the web interface, change your settings, or post via web, like any mailman, sympa or listar mailing list.
If you don't want a google account, or prefer to do this over email, you can send an email to: mod-xslt+subscribe@googlegroups.com.
To access the web archives, you can visit
To send an email, just write to mod-xslt@googlegroups.com.
If you want to contribute code, feature, bugfixes, ... the mailing list is also the right place where to start.
